results.title: CBC Results
results.content:
• Hemoglobin: 11.2 g/dL (Low)
• MCV: 78 fL (Low)
• Ferritin: 15 ng/mL (Low)
• Folate: 4.0 ng/mL (Normal)
• B12: 300 pg/mL (Normal)
• Indicates iron deficiency anemia

results.title: Celiac Serology Results
results.content:
• Tissue Transglutaminase IgA: 45 U/mL (Positive >10)
• Total IgA: 120 mg/dL (Normal)
• Strongly suggests Celiac Disease

results.title: EMA Test Results
results.content:
• IgA Endomysial Antibody: Positive
• Pattern consistent with Celiac Disease

results.title: Biopsy Results
results.content:
• Duodenal mucosa shows villous atrophy
• Intraepithelial lymphocytes increased
• Crypt hyperplasia present
• Marsh Type 3 changes confirmed

results.title: Stool Test Results
results.content:
• Steatorrhea present
• Fecal fat: 12g/24h (Normal <7)
• No infectious organisms found
